CatDescriptText: David Leo Lawrence was mayor of Pittsburgh from 1946 to 1958, and governor of Pennsylvania from 1959 to 1963.  He died in 1966.The podium has a sign on it reading " The Pittsburgh H...?"  the last word is obscured by a flower arrangement.
TitMainTitle: Woman covering microphone with gloved hand at podium on head banquet table, with men and woman, including David L. Lawrence, to her left
